Projects

01

PulseChat A Chat App

PulseChat is a real-time chat application built with React, Node.js, and Socket.io. It offers secure user authentication, group and one-on-one chat functionality, file sharing via Cloudinary, and a responsive interface using Tailwind CSS and MUI. The app uses MongoDB with Mongoose for data storage and features optimized performance with Vite.

02

DailyDose –Blog Platformp

Developed a multiuser blog platform that allows users to create, read, update, and delete blog posts. The platform features user authentication, enabling users to register and log in to manage their blog posts. It also includes a responsive design, ensuring a seamless experience across different devices. The project is built using modern web technologies, including React for the frontend, Node.js and cloudflare workers for the backend, and posgreSQL with Prisma ORM for the database. The platform is deployed on Vercel, providing a reliable and scalable hosting solution.

03

Koodle- E-Learing Web App

Developed a Course Selling multiuser E-learning platform that allows users to browse through a list of courses, view course details, and purchase courses using the Razorpay payment gateway. The app also includes features like user authentication, course management, and payment processing.

04

CineAI-Movie HUB

CineAI is a movie discovery web app built with React, Vite, and Firebase, offering features like user authentication, movie browsing with TMDB API integration, and AI-driven movie suggestions using Gemini API. It provides a responsive UI with optimized performance, allowing users to explore, watch trailers, and get detailed movie information.

05

Text Summarizer-bart

The Text Summarizer is an application built using Hugging Face's pre-trained models, designed to generate concise summaries from longer text inputs. It leverages state-of-the-art NLP techniques to process and condense content, providing users with clear and relevant summaries in seconds. The tool is highly efficient, offering a seamless experience for anyone needing quick text summarization.

06

TigerTap-Speed Test Typing

Designed and developed TigerTap, a modern web application that measures and improves typing speed and accuracy. The app features customizable typing tests, real-time performance tracking, and instant feedback on words per minute (WPM), accuracy, and error rates. Users can practice with various text samples and track their progress over time to enhance their typing skills.
